rulings.text: An activated ability is a mana ability if it meets all of the following criteria: it doesn't require a target, it could add mana to a player's mana pool when it resolves, and it's not a loyalty ability.

A triggered ability is a mana ability if it meets all of the following criteria: it doesn't require a target, it triggers from the resolution of an activated mana ability  or from mana being added to a player's mana pool, and it could add mana to a player's mana pool when it resolves.
